Name: Skin
Description: Angelo Espinosa, a founding member of Generation X, code-named "Skin" due to his mutant ability to extend and control his extra skin in any number of ways.
FirstComicDescription: PHALANX COVENANT tie-in! The forces of the Phalanx are hunting down the next generation of mutant heroes! Can the X-Men save them before they're assimilated?
